pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Propensity Score Cumulative Distribution Function // Implements the generalized propensity score cumulative distribution function proposed by Greene (2017) https://digital commons.library.tmc.edu/dissertations/AAI10681743/. A single scalar balancing score is calculated for any generalized propensity score vector with three or more treatments. This balancing score is used for propensity score matching and stratification in outcome analyses when analyzing either ordinal or multinomial treatments.
